title: Ethereum 2.0 Final Upgrade Complete – Network Processes 100,000 Transactions Per Second
shortdescription: The Merge Part 2 brings instant finality and zero gas fees as ETH price surges 40% overnight.
description: Network now processes 100K TPS with near-zero fees — ETH price jumps 40% as scalability breakthrough completes.
author: Emma Chen

title: Tether Launches $1 Billion Bitcoin Mining Operation – Largest Corporate Mining Venture Ever
shortdescription: USDT issuer enters mining with massive investment across Paraguay, El Salvador, and Texas facilities.
description: Tether deploys 100,000 ASIC miners using 100% renewable energy — expects 10 EH/s hashrate by Q3 2026.
author: Emma Chen

title: Bitcoin Lightning Network Hits 1 Million Nodes – Payment Rails Now Rival Visa
shortdescription: Layer 2 solution processes 500,000 transactions per second as global adoption explodes.
description: Lightning Network capacity grows to 25,000 BTC ($2.5B) — McDonald's, Starbucks, Walmart now accept Lightning payments.
author: Emma Chen

title: BlackRock Bitcoin ETF Reaches $100 Billion AUM – Largest ETF Launch in History
shortdescription: IBIT shatters all records as institutional adoption accelerates beyond expectations.
description: iShares Bitcoin Trust holds 4.5% of all Bitcoin ever mined — combined spot ETF market surpasses gold ETFs.
author: Emma Chen

title: Ripple vs SEC Case Officially Dismissed – XRP Surges 40% Overnight
shortdescription: After 4 years, judge rules XRP not a security in landmark victory.
description: SEC drops appeal after devastating court loss – XRP relisted on major U.S. exchanges within hours.
author: Emma Chen

title: Coinbase Launches Decentralized Exchange on Base – Competes Directly with Uniswap
shortdescription: Largest U.S. exchange enters DEX market with zero-fee trading and institutional-grade liquidity.
description: Coinbase DEX launches with $5B TVL — integrates with 100M+ user base and bridges CeFi and DeFi.
author: Emma Chen

title: Trump Announces U.S. Strategic Bitcoin Reserve – BTC Hits $108,000
shortdescription: President-elect confirms government will hold Bitcoin as national reserve asset – biggest crypto policy win ever.
description: In first post-election speech, Donald Trump declares the United States will begin accumulating Bitcoin as a strategic reserve, similar to oil. Treasury to purchase 1 million BTC over 5 years.
author: Emma Chen

title: Circle Files for $50 Billion IPO – USDC Becomes First Public Stablecoin Giant
shortdescription: USDC issuer goes public at highest crypto valuation since Coinbase – Tether market share plummets.
description: Circle's S-1 reveals $1.1B annual revenue, 85% institutional volume, and plans to dominate regulated stablecoin market after going public in 2025.
author: Emma Chen
